title: beacon-chain build fail on Windows7 x64
body:
beacon-chain build fail, but validator build successfully. 
error message is below:

```

# bazel build beacon-chain:beacon-chain
Loading:

 - E:/gopath/src/github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/WORKSPACE:147:1
Analyzing: target //beacon-chain:beacon-chain (1 packages loaded, 0 targets configured)

build again with --verbose_failures flag.
message is below:
```
Administrator@Canonchain MSYS /e/GoPath/src/github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm
# bazel build beacon-chain:beacon-chain --verbose_failures

This should build OK with bazel  v1+. Please reopen if this is not the case. Thanks!
